Headline 1: Best Villas to rent in Mykonos Greece
Description: If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

Headline 1: Best Villas to rent in Mykonos Greece
Description: If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

Headline 1: Top Villa Rentals and Concierge Services in Mykonos Greece
Description: If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

Headline 1: Top Villa Rentals and Concierge Services in Mykonos Greece
Description: If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

Description: If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

Headline 1: Luxury Yacht Charters in Mediterranean Sea
Description: If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

Headline 1: Luxury Yacht Charters in Mediterranean Sea
Description: With the support of Blue Collection, you can make sure that your vacation will be out of this world before you get to the island. We can guarantee that you will book your Luxury Villa or Service at the Best Price and Best Quality of the market! The 1st place of the I International Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece is an indisputable Guarantee of our Total Quality Management and our Best Price Policy can assure that you will find what you need on the Best rates available!

Description: On our website, you can have a look at a variety of offbeat things to do in Mykonos, Greece, rent a house on the beach of the Aegean Sea, book premium concierge services, and more. We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.

Headline 1: Luxury Yacht Charters in Mediterranean Sea
Description: If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

Headline 1: Luxury Yacht Charters in Mediterranean Sea
Description: With the support of Blue Collection, you can make sure that your vacation will be out of this world before you get to the island. We can guarantee that you will book your Luxury Villa or Service at the Best Price and Best Quality of the market! The 1st place of the I International Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece is an indisputable Guarantee of our Total Quality Management and our Best Price Policy can assure that you will find what you need on the Best rates available!

Headline 1: Luxury Yacht Charters in Mediterranean Sea
Description: On our website, you can have a look at a variety of offbeat things to do in Mykonos, Greece, rent a house on the beach of the Aegean Sea, book premium concierge services, and more. We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.

Description: If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.

Welcome to the place where you can find only the Top and Best Villas in Mykonos for rent .Rent your Villa in Mykonos through Blue Collection and enjoy the Absolute Luxury Living…Blue Collection is the Leading Official Provider of Luxury Villas for Rent and VIP
Blue Collection became the winner of the International Award of Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece.

Our team has intimate knowledge of the Greek islands and also in every destination we operate, so by recognizing the value of genuine hospitality we aim to exceed our guests expectations ….every time, every day in every detail !!!

Blue Concierge in Greece is the Leading Luxury Provider in the World of Luxury Lifestyle Management and Concierge Services not only in Mykonos and Athens but also through its Network in Paris, Cannes, Nice, St. Tropez, Monaco, Courchevel, Gstaad, Ibiza, Americas & Caribbean.
Our Exclusive Cub Members Enjoying Unique Services and allows you to focus on the things that really matter, whilst we take care of the rest.
Our dedicated team of Lifestyle managers and Minders work Globally to fulfill your every need.

Blue Yachting in Mykonos – Greece has access to over 2.000 Luxury Yachts for charter in some of the most desirable and Stunning Locations in the World.Our charter yachts range from 30m all the way up to 165m luxury mega yachts in beautiful locales such as the Mediterranean, the Caribbean and the Gulf.

Whether you want a slice of history with a Classic Yacht, the wind through your hair with a Sailing Yacht or the Ultimate in Privacy, Exclusivity and Luxury with a Mega Yacht, our Yacht charter Experts are Specialists in creating tailor-made Holidays and Cruises in Every Corner of the World with the Discretion and Service that’s to be expected.

Blue Aviation is the Ultimate resource for all your Private, Corporate, and Luxury Air Charter Flights to and from Mykonos.Our Guests have access to the most sought-after types of Private Jet aircrafts and Helicopters in Greece. This include the Falcon 900 (large jets),

and Falcon 7X (ultra long range jets) as well as Agusta-109 , Airbus Eurocopters & Bell-407 Helicopters.Through our globally supporting team we are able to co-ordinate and organise a take off in 2 hours from every destination in Europe and in 4 hours in the rest of the world.Our flight experts are available 24/7 to advise you on the best option in according to your needs.

Blue Security, is the Security department of Blue Collection – Mykonos, dedicated to providing Advanced Strategic Security solutions 24/7 to Individuals or to Corporate and Government Agencies around Mykonos, Athens and other Selected Destinations in Greece.

Blue Collection is focused on success and client’s satisfaction through perseverance, determination and commitment.

If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

With the support of Blue Collection, you can make sure that your vacation will be out of this world before you get to the island. We can guarantee that you will book your Luxury Villa or Service at the Best Price and Best Quality of the market! The 1st place of the I International Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece is an indisputable Guarantee of our Total Quality Management and our Best Price Policy can assure that you will find what you need on the Best rates available!
Feel comfortable, feast like a king and be sure that your luxury vacations will be unique!

On our website, you can have a look at a variety of offbeat things to do in Mykonos, Greece, rent a house on the beach of the Aegean Sea, book premium concierge services, and more. We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.
Blue Collection’s network of offices and partners are ready to support you operating continuously at all times.

If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

With the support of Blue Collection, you can make sure that your vacation will be out of this world before you get to the island. We can guarantee that you will book your Luxury Villa or Service at the Best Price and Best Quality of the market! The 1st place of the I International Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece is an indisputable Guarantee of our Total Quality Management and our Best Price Policy can assure that you will find what you need on the Best rates available!
Feel comfortable, feast like a king and be sure that your luxury vacations will be unique!

On our website, you can have a look at a variety of offbeat things to do in Mykonos, Greece, rent a house on the beach of the Aegean Sea, book premium concierge services, and more. We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.
Blue Collection’s network of offices and partners are ready to support you operating continuously at all times.

With expertise, professional experience and great knowledge of the Greek Islands, we will fully meet your expectations.

Welcome to the place where you can find only the Top and Best Villas in Mykonos for rent .Rent your Villa in Mykonos through Blue Collection and enjoy the Absolute Luxury Living…Blue Collection is the Leading Official Provider of Luxury Villas for Rent and VIP
Blue Collection became the winner of the International Award of Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece.
Our villa rental department is also known for dynamic activity, providing clients with a comprehensive selection of property rentals and excellent concierge services.

Our team has intimate knowledge of the Greek islands and also in every destination we operate, so by recognizing the value of genuine hospitality we aim to exceed our guests expectations ….every time, every day in every detail !!!

Blue Concierge in Greece is the Leading Luxury Provider in the World of Luxury Lifestyle Management and Concierge Services not only in Mykonos and Athens but also through its Network in Paris, Cannes, Nice, St. Tropez, Monaco, Courchevel, Gstaad, Ibiza, Americas & Caribbean.
Our Exclusive Cub Members Enjoying Unique Services and allows you to focus on the things that really matter, whilst we take care of the rest.
Our dedicated team of Lifestyle managers and Minders work Globally to fulfill your every need.

Blue Yachting in Mykonos – Greece has access to over 2.000 Luxury Yachts for charter in some of the most desirable and Stunning Locations in the World.Our charter yachts range from 30m all the way up to 165m luxury mega yachts in beautiful locales such as the Mediterranean, the Caribbean and the Gulf.

Whether you want a slice of history with a Classic Yacht, the wind through your hair with a Sailing Yacht or the Ultimate in Privacy, Exclusivity and Luxury with a Mega Yacht, our Yacht charter Experts are Specialists in creating tailor-made Holidays and Cruises in Every Corner of the World with the Discretion and Service that’s to be expected.

Blue Aviation is the Ultimate resource for all your Private, Corporate, and Luxury Air Charter Flights to and from Mykonos.Our Guests have access to the most sought-after types of Private Jet aircrafts and Helicopters in Greece. This include the Falcon 900 (large jets),

and Falcon 7X (ultra long range jets) as well as Agusta-109 , Airbus Eurocopters & Bell-407 Helicopters.Through our globally supporting team we are able to co-ordinate and organise a take off in 2 hours from every destination in Europe and in 4 hours in the rest of the world.Our flight experts are available 24/7 to advise you on the best option in according to your needs.

Blue Security, is the Security department of Blue Collection – Mykonos, dedicated to providing Advanced Strategic Security solutions 24/7 to Individuals or to Corporate and Government Agencies around Mykonos, Athens and other Selected Destinations in Greece.

We are determined to Deliver Security and Close Protection Services in Mykonos of the highest qualityWhether you require one Close Protection Officer or a Team of Close Protection Operatives, we Provide and Guarantee the Best Personal Protection Security operatives for Royalties, VIPs, Celebrities, Executives, and other at-risk Individuals needing Specialized Protective Services in Mykonos

Blue Mykonos Limousine Services and Transfers is the leading Luxury Chauffeur & Limousine service and it can provide discrete and understated VIP Chauffeur and Ground Transportation Services in Mykonos , Athens and in Selected destination in Greece for all Discerning Passengers, Dignitaries, Celebrities and VIP’s.
Blue Collection is focused on success and client’s satisfaction through perseverance, determination and commitment.

If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

With the support of Blue Collection, you can make sure that your vacation will be out of this world before you get to the island. We can guarantee that you will book your Luxury Villa or Service at the Best Price and Best Quality of the market! The 1st place of the I International Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece is an indisputable Guarantee of our Total Quality Management and our Best Price Policy can assure that you will find what you need on the Best rates available!
Feel comfortable, feast like a king and be sure that your luxury vacations will be unique!

On our website, you can have a look at a variety of offbeat things to do in Mykonos, Greece, rent a house on the beach of the Aegean Sea, book premium concierge services, and more. We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.
Blue Collection’s network of offices and partners are ready to support you operating continuously at all times.

If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

With the support of Blue Collection, you can make sure that your vacation will be out of this world before you get to the island. We can guarantee that you will book your Luxury Villa or Service at the Best Price and Best Quality of the market! The 1st place of the I International Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece is an indisputable Guarantee of our Total Quality Management and our Best Price Policy can assure that you will find what you need on the Best rates available!
Feel comfortable, feast like a king and be sure that your luxury vacations will be unique!

On our website, you can have a look at a variety of offbeat things to do in Mykonos, Greece, rent a house on the beach of the Aegean Sea, book premium concierge services, and more. We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.
Blue Collection’s network of offices and partners are ready to support you operating continuously at all times.

With expertise, professional experience and great knowledge of the Greek Islands, we will fully meet your expectations.

Welcome to the place where you can find only the Top and Best Villas in Mykonos for rent .Rent your Villa in Mykonos through Blue Collection and enjoy the Absolute Luxury Living…Blue Collection is the Leading Official Provider of Luxury Villas for Rent and VIP
Blue Collection became the winner of the International Award of Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece.
Our villa rental department is also known for dynamic activity, providing clients with a comprehensive selection of property rentals and excellent concierge services.

Our team has intimate knowledge of the Greek islands and also in every destination we operate, so by recognizing the value of genuine hospitality we aim to exceed our guests expectations ….every time, every day in every detail !!!

Blue Concierge in Greece is the Leading Luxury Provider in the World of Luxury Lifestyle Management and Concierge Services not only in Mykonos and Athens but also through its Network in Paris, Cannes, Nice, St. Tropez, Monaco, Courchevel, Gstaad, Ibiza, Americas & Caribbean.
Our Exclusive Cub Members Enjoying Unique Services and allows you to focus on the things that really matter, whilst we take care of the rest.
Our dedicated team of Lifestyle managers and Minders work Globally to fulfill your every need.

Blue Yachting in Mykonos – Greece has access to over 2.000 Luxury Yachts for charter in some of the most desirable and Stunning Locations in the World.Our charter yachts range from 30m all the way up to 165m luxury mega yachts in beautiful locales such as the Mediterranean, the Caribbean and the Gulf.

Whether you want a slice of history with a Classic Yacht, the wind through your hair with a Sailing Yacht or the Ultimate in Privacy, Exclusivity and Luxury with a Mega Yacht, our Yacht charter Experts are Specialists in creating tailor-made Holidays and Cruises in Every Corner of the World with the Discretion and Service that’s to be expected.

Blue Aviation is the Ultimate resource for all your Private, Corporate, and Luxury Air Charter Flights to and from Mykonos.Our Guests have access to the most sought-after types of Private Jet aircrafts and Helicopters in Greece. This include the Falcon 900 (large jets),

and Falcon 7X (ultra long range jets) as well as Agusta-109 , Airbus Eurocopters & Bell-407 Helicopters.Through our globally supporting team we are able to co-ordinate and organise a take off in 2 hours from every destination in Europe and in 4 hours in the rest of the world.Our flight experts are available 24/7 to advise you on the best option in according to your needs.

Blue Security, is the Security department of Blue Collection – Mykonos, dedicated to providing Advanced Strategic Security solutions 24/7 to Individuals or to Corporate and Government Agencies around Mykonos, Athens and other Selected Destinations in Greece.

We are determined to Deliver Security and Close Protection Services in Mykonos of the highest qualityWhether you require one Close Protection Officer or a Team of Close Protection Operatives, we Provide and Guarantee the Best Personal Protection Security operatives for Royalties, VIPs, Celebrities, Executives, and other at-risk Individuals needing Specialized Protective Services in Mykonos

Blue Mykonos Limousine Services and Transfers is the leading Luxury Chauffeur & Limousine service and it can provide discrete and understated VIP Chauffeur and Ground Transportation Services in Mykonos , Athens and in Selected destination in Greece for all Discerning Passengers, Dignitaries, Celebrities and VIP’s.
Blue Collection is focused on success and client’s satisfaction through perseverance, determination and commitment.

If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

With the support of Blue Collection, you can make sure that your vacation will be out of this world before you get to the island. We can guarantee that you will book your Luxury Villa or Service at the Best Price and Best Quality of the market! The 1st place of the I International Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece is an indisputable Guarantee of our Total Quality Management and our Best Price Policy can assure that you will find what you need on the Best rates available!
Feel comfortable, feast like a king and be sure that your luxury vacations will be unique!

On our website, you can have a look at a variety of offbeat things to do in Mykonos, Greece, rent a house on the beach of the Aegean Sea, book premium concierge services, and more. We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.
Blue Collection’s network of offices and partners are ready to support you operating continuously at all times.

If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

With the support of Blue Collection, you can make sure that your vacation will be out of this world before you get to the island. We can guarantee that you will book your Luxury Villa or Service at the Best Price and Best Quality of the market! The 1st place of the I International Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece is an indisputable Guarantee of our Total Quality Management and our Best Price Policy can assure that you will find what you need on the Best rates available!
Feel comfortable, feast like a king and be sure that your luxury vacations will be unique!

On our website, you can have a look at a variety of offbeat things to do in Mykonos, Greece, rent a house on the beach of the Aegean Sea, book premium concierge services, and more. We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.
Blue Collection’s network of offices and partners are ready to support you operating continuously at all times.

With expertise, professional experience and great knowledge of the Greek Islands, we will fully meet your expectations.

Welcome to the place where you can find only the Top and Best Villas in Mykonos for rent .Rent your Villa in Mykonos through Blue Collection and enjoy the Absolute Luxury Living…Blue Collection is the Leading Official Provider of Luxury Villas for Rent and VIP
Blue Collection became the winner of the International Award of Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece.
Our villa rental department is also known for dynamic activity, providing clients with a comprehensive selection of property rentals and excellent concierge services.

Our team has intimate knowledge of the Greek islands and also in every destination we operate, so by recognizing the value of genuine hospitality we aim to exceed our guests expectations ….every time, every day in every detail !!!

Blue Concierge in Greece is the Leading Luxury Provider in the World of Luxury Lifestyle Management and Concierge Services not only in Mykonos and Athens but also through its Network in Paris, Cannes, Nice, St. Tropez, Monaco, Courchevel, Gstaad, Ibiza, Americas & Caribbean.
Our Exclusive Cub Members Enjoying Unique Services and allows you to focus on the things that really matter, whilst we take care of the rest.
Our dedicated team of Lifestyle managers and Minders work Globally to fulfill your every need.

Blue Yachting in Mykonos – Greece has access to over 2.000 Luxury Yachts for charter in some of the most desirable and Stunning Locations in the World.Our charter yachts range from 30m all the way up to 165m luxury mega yachts in beautiful locales such as the Mediterranean, the Caribbean and the Gulf.

Whether you want a slice of history with a Classic Yacht, the wind through your hair with a Sailing Yacht or the Ultimate in Privacy, Exclusivity and Luxury with a Mega Yacht, our Yacht charter Experts are Specialists in creating tailor-made Holidays and Cruises in Every Corner of the World with the Discretion and Service that’s to be expected.

Blue Aviation is the Ultimate resource for all your Private, Corporate, and Luxury Air Charter Flights to and from Mykonos.Our Guests have access to the most sought-after types of Private Jet aircrafts and Helicopters in Greece. This include the Falcon 900 (large jets),

and Falcon 7X (ultra long range jets) as well as Agusta-109 , Airbus Eurocopters & Bell-407 Helicopters.Through our globally supporting team we are able to co-ordinate and organise a take off in 2 hours from every destination in Europe and in 4 hours in the rest of the world.Our flight experts are available 24/7 to advise you on the best option in according to your needs.

Blue Security, is the Security department of Blue Collection – Mykonos, dedicated to providing Advanced Strategic Security solutions 24/7 to Individuals or to Corporate and Government Agencies around Mykonos, Athens and other Selected Destinations in Greece.

We are determined to Deliver Security and Close Protection Services in Mykonos of the highest qualityWhether you require one Close Protection Officer or a Team of Close Protection Operatives, we Provide and Guarantee the Best Personal Protection Security operatives for Royalties, VIPs, Celebrities, Executives, and other at-risk Individuals needing Specialized Protective Services in Mykonos

Blue Mykonos Limousine Services and Transfers is the leading Luxury Chauffeur & Limousine service and it can provide discrete and understated VIP Chauffeur and Ground Transportation Services in Mykonos , Athens and in Selected destination in Greece for all Discerning Passengers, Dignitaries, Celebrities and VIP’s.
Blue Collection is focused on success and client’s satisfaction through perseverance, determination and commitment.

If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

With the support of Blue Collection, you can make sure that your vacation will be out of this world before you get to the island. We can guarantee that you will book your Luxury Villa or Service at the Best Price and Best Quality of the market! The 1st place of the I International Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece is an indisputable Guarantee of our Total Quality Management and our Best Price Policy can assure that you will find what you need on the Best rates available!
Feel comfortable, feast like a king and be sure that your luxury vacations will be unique!

On our website, you can have a look at a variety of offbeat things to do in Mykonos, Greece, rent a house on the beach of the Aegean Sea, book premium concierge services, and more. We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.
Blue Collection’s network of offices and partners are ready to support you operating continuously at all times.

If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

With the support of Blue Collection, you can make sure that your vacation will be out of this world before you get to the island. We can guarantee that you will book your Luxury Villa or Service at the Best Price and Best Quality of the market! The 1st place of the I International Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece is an indisputable Guarantee of our Total Quality Management and our Best Price Policy can assure that you will find what you need on the Best rates available!
Feel comfortable, feast like a king and be sure that your luxury vacations will be unique!

On our website, you can have a look at a variety of offbeat things to do in Mykonos, Greece, rent a house on the beach of the Aegean Sea, book premium concierge services, and more. We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.
Blue Collection’s network of offices and partners are ready to support you operating continuously at all times.

With expertise, professional experience and great knowledge of the Greek Islands, we will fully meet your expectations.

Welcome to the place where you can find only the Top and Best Villas in Mykonos for rent .Rent your Villa in Mykonos through Blue Collection and enjoy the Absolute Luxury Living…Blue Collection is the Leading Official Provider of Luxury Villas for Rent and VIP
Blue Collection became the winner of the International Award of Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece.
Our villa rental department is also known for dynamic activity, providing clients with a comprehensive selection of property rentals and excellent concierge services.

Our team has intimate knowledge of the Greek islands and also in every destination we operate, so by recognizing the value of genuine hospitality we aim to exceed our guests expectations ….every time, every day in every detail !!!

Blue Concierge in Greece is the Leading Luxury Provider in the World of Luxury Lifestyle Management and Concierge Services not only in Mykonos and Athens but also through its Network in Paris, Cannes, Nice, St. Tropez, Monaco, Courchevel, Gstaad, Ibiza, Americas & Caribbean.
Our Exclusive Cub Members Enjoying Unique Services and allows you to focus on the things that really matter, whilst we take care of the rest.
Our dedicated team of Lifestyle managers and Minders work Globally to fulfill your every need.

Blue Yachting in Mykonos – Greece has access to over 2.000 Luxury Yachts for charter in some of the most desirable and Stunning Locations in the World.Our charter yachts range from 30m all the way up to 165m luxury mega yachts in beautiful locales such as the Mediterranean, the Caribbean and the Gulf.

Whether you want a slice of history with a Classic Yacht, the wind through your hair with a Sailing Yacht or the Ultimate in Privacy, Exclusivity and Luxury with a Mega Yacht, our Yacht charter Experts are Specialists in creating tailor-made Holidays and Cruises in Every Corner of the World with the Discretion and Service that’s to be expected.

Blue Aviation is the Ultimate resource for all your Private, Corporate, and Luxury Air Charter Flights to and from Mykonos.Our Guests have access to the most sought-after types of Private Jet aircrafts and Helicopters in Greece. This include the Falcon 900 (large jets),

and Falcon 7X (ultra long range jets) as well as Agusta-109 , Airbus Eurocopters & Bell-407 Helicopters.Through our globally supporting team we are able to co-ordinate and organise a take off in 2 hours from every destination in Europe and in 4 hours in the rest of the world.Our flight experts are available 24/7 to advise you on the best option in according to your needs.

Blue Security, is the Security department of Blue Collection – Mykonos, dedicated to providing Advanced Strategic Security solutions 24/7 to Individuals or to Corporate and Government Agencies around Mykonos, Athens and other Selected Destinations in Greece.

We are determined to Deliver Security and Close Protection Services in Mykonos of the highest qualityWhether you require one Close Protection Officer or a Team of Close Protection Operatives, we Provide and Guarantee the Best Personal Protection Security operatives for Royalties, VIPs, Celebrities, Executives, and other at-risk Individuals needing Specialized Protective Services in Mykonos

Blue Mykonos Limousine Services and Transfers is the leading Luxury Chauffeur & Limousine service and it can provide discrete and understated VIP Chauffeur and Ground Transportation Services in Mykonos , Athens and in Selected destination in Greece for all Discerning Passengers, Dignitaries, Celebrities and VIP’s.
Blue Collection is focused on success and client’s satisfaction through perseverance, determination and commitment.

If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.

With the support of Blue Collection, you can make sure that your vacation will be out of this world before you get to the island. We can guarantee that you will book your Luxury Villa or Service at the Best Price and Best Quality of the market! The 1st place of the I International Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2018 in the category of Luxury Villas Rent Service in Greece is an indisputable Guarantee of our Total Quality Management and our Best Price Policy can assure that you will find what you need on the Best rates available!
Feel comfortable, feast like a king and be sure that your luxury vacations will be unique!

On our website, you can have a look at a variety of offbeat things to do in Mykonos, Greece, rent a house on the beach of the Aegean Sea, book premium concierge services, and more. We’ve made all these available under one roof so that you don’t even need to lift a finger. Simply browse through our Mykonos villa rental listings, find the property that perfectly suits you and make your reservation at the best prices in the market. As simple as that! Our collection includes houses for the most discerning guests. Once you rent a beachfront villa overlooking the smooth sea in Mykonos, you will find yourself pampering in luxurious surroundings with hotel-like amenities and all the benefits of absolute privacy. And you won’t have to pay an excessive amount of money for such an opulent vacation. At Blue Collection, we add only reasonably priced properties to our listings so that you can easily find the one that meets your budget. Apart from Mykonos, Greece villa homes for rent, our range of properties is made up of, spectacular villas on the island of Paros, Greece, luxury accommodations in Ios, Greece,magnificent chalets in Courchevel, France, luxury Yacht Charters all over the Mediterranean and real estate for sale in Top luxury lifestyle destinations.
Blue Collection’s network of offices and partners are ready to support you operating continuously at all times.

Description: If you are one of those travel enthusiasts who keep thinking about exploring the world’s most enchanting places, Mykonos should be your next destination to go. Often called as Ibiza of Greece, this island attracts millions of holiday-makers, allowing them to bask in the sunshine wherever they head off to. It is beyond doubt that its sun-drenched beaches, golden sand, and panoramic views of the Aegean Sea will account for the fantastic experience. With Blue Collection, however, you can go beyond just that! We offer you an opportunity to make it never-to-be-forgotten by living a life of luxury in one of Mykonos vacation rentals. Spending a vacation in some gorgeous accommodation that is filled with the ultimate luxury from top to bottom does make a difference when traveling. If your interest has just got piqued, then Blue Collection is a source of Mykonos houses for rent that you need. Even if you have been to the island before, now you will discover its alluring side in a new light.
